item.title: How to make a new train area
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

yeah i know how to use auto spawn now, thanks for breaking it down though chassy. Also…

I didnt just start… this is my 3rd server… just forgot how to do this. Thanks to the ones who helped, Rep++ if i could lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a new train area

item.title: How to make a new train area
item.dc:creator: @kmansnoob kmansnoob
item.description:
@kmansnoob wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:260078”]Wow, enough of the flaming. If you can’t help him, don’t fucking post.

You will see something like this in autospawn.cfg:

spawn = 2630	2406	5084	0	3577	3300	3573	3296	2	Tz kek

Here it is broken down.

spawn = NPCID	COORD1	COORD2	HEIGHT	RANGEX1	RANGEX2	RANGEY1	RANGEY2	WalkType	Name

RangeX1 and RangeX2 and them can be left at 0. Your height will MOST likely be 0 also, unless you are spawning it on a 2nd floor. Walktype should be 2 for most npcs also. You can basically figure it out just by looking at those two lines.

Also, don’t forget to use TABS and NOT spaces when editing .cfg files.[/quote]

I did help him you prick.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a new train area
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Wow, enough of the flaming. If you can’t help him, don’t fucking post.

You will see something like this in autospawn.cfg:

spawn = 2630	2406	5084	0	3577	3300	3573	3296	2	Tz kek

Here it is broken down.

spawn = NPCID	COORD1	COORD2	HEIGHT	RANGEX1	RANGEX2	RANGEY1	RANGEY2	WalkType	Name

RangeX1 and RangeX2 and them can be left at 0. Your height will MOST likely be 0 also, unless you are spawning it on a 2nd floor. Walktype should be 2 for most npcs also. You can basically figure it out just by looking at those two lines.

Also, don’t forget to use TABS and NOT spaces when editing .cfg files.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a new train area
item.dc:creator: @kmansnoob kmansnoob
item.description:
@kmansnoob wrote:

Server Creator Brian:

i know how to do that, but i meant how do i move the npcs to the spot i want? and add the npcs?

Well obviously you don’t know that. You just don’t want to admit you know jackshit about making servers.

Open autospawn.cfg

Copy a line. Replace the ID with the NPC you want. Change the coords so it spawns where you want. Change the walking restrictions.

Read full topic

@mrrules wrote:

Place for people to train?

Ether find a empty spot on the map and put monsters there or find a spot were some are and remove them and put the ones you want there.
